text:
Hello,
I'm Alex Dupont, I'm 18 years old and now arrived in Rennes2 University. In highschool we never really experiment the idea of looking for a futur job, so it was kinda hard for me to imagine my professional futur. I really wanted to find my way, something I like to do, something I could do everyday without feeling bored about it. I wanted to study something that looks like me, that makes want to wake up and go to school everyday.
In 2017 I joinned, as a benevol, an association called TIBAP, in which we organize every year an international basketball tournament for kids. Im the social media manajor in this association. I post on social media, but I also contact foreign basketball clubs to invite them in Paris for the tournament. It's an amazing exprience that makes me practice foreign languages, meet people from all around the world but also make me work in the environnement I like.
This association experience gave me the taste for the sector of the communication. I realised that it is the thing I want to do. It is the sector that makes me enjoy what I am doing. In the end of highschool I knew I had to study communication. It's a very large subject with so many interisting ways. So with Parcoursup I sent my profil to different schools, like "BTS Communication" or "licence information communication" in Rennes2 University. That's how I ended up here, studying the Information & Communication in Paris.
Thank you for reading.
Alex Dupont
